data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Longding, Arunachal Pradesh, India.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Longding, Arunachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the county of Longding, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Longding, Arunachal Pradesh, India from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Longding to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Kachin people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Kachin people.
Father, help your children in Longding, Arunachal Pradesh, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Longding, Arunachal Pradesh, India humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 627 believers in Longding.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

location.name: Longding
location.people_groups_list: Chepang, Bania Brittal, Sartang, Puroik, Kachari Sonwal
